Reviews.Title: Great LG Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I just got one of these LG Cell Phones from Service SF Bay Area and I love this phone.  It has all the features I need, like long battery life, bluethooth for my headset when driving and a nice camera.I easily activated the cell phone on my account with the enclosed instructions.GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: T. Woods
Reviews.Content: I just bought this type phone the other day, it was from walmart, but same phone same deal but a little more affordable. This is a great phone, I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Vx5500
Reviews.Author: Walt
Reviews.Content: Good solid little phone that has excellent reception. Only negative is that there is no slot for a storage card, Verizon Wireless LG VX5500 Cell Phone

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Speechless
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome, and for the price it's a big surprise. I live out of town close to mountains, and generally I don't even get cell phone service out here. I do with this phone, and it's very clear- no interruptions or static or anything.  I highly recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: H. Jackson
Reviews.Content: Phone works great and has just what I need and wanted in a cell phone as I don't need a smart phone and I like the small size that fits nicely in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: april
Reviews.Content: dit was ok. Thought it was suitable for its usuage. Would buy again. Definetly a phone i would give my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Good Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I've owned this phone for over two years.  It is a good basic phone. The only drawback is that on occasion my phone would not ring when an incoming call was coming in. It has happened only a few times. I don't know if this is a problem with the phone or with the service.

Reviews.Title: Not Refurbished?
Reviews.Author: smetweiss
Reviews.Content: Phone seems to work ok. Only concern is the use of term "refurbished".That should mean all previous owner information has been removedand it wasn't. E-mails, voice mails, text messages, display settings all indicateda previous owner.

Reviews.Title: just like my old one- love it
Reviews.Author: shannon nicholson
Reviews.Content: perfect- only draw back is that it was a pre-paid phone but it works and I have not had any issues with carrier.

Reviews.Title: Great Buying Experience
Reviews.Author: Asa Banks
Reviews.Content: Needed an inexpensive temporary phone.  This one fit the bill perfectly.  The phone works great with no problems.  Had a minor problem with the delivery, but the reseller acted promptly to correct the situation.  Very pleased with the transaction.

Reviews.Title: Verizon CDMA 3G feature phone
Reviews.Author: Brent Ekins
Reviews.Content: just what my wife wanted. A phone that makes phone calls.  Works perfectly and has a very long battery life on standby.

Reviews.Title: LG Phones are good
Reviews.Author: kke
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to the differences from my last phone, but it's a simple, straight-forward phone - exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: I call, I answer.  Someday I will learn to use the other stuff.
Reviews.Author: Cecilson "Cecilson"
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement for the same model phone that I have been using for nearly five years.  Maybe I will not learn to use the other stuff.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed at just the Right time
Reviews.Author: Sara M. "Sara M."
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone, really for, well, data retrieval and legal purposes to be upfront, as my previous phone of this kind broke a year and a half ago for an unknown cause. In that phone contained pictures of my lovely little furry angel, my kitten, who passed away at 6 months old, and TEXT MESSAGES with VERY IMPORTANT INFORMATION :). I recently found out that the adapter for the charger broke, and it might not be fixable, and if it could be fixed, it would be quite pricey. Another thought was to simply order a replacement battery, but I needed a charging source for it, hence the phone. Turns out I just happened to drop my other, working phone in the toilet shortly after this was sent, and what a miracle it was to have a back-up phone to use until my new phone from my service company was shipped to me! I just simply had to activate another account and just prepay for enough minutes to get me buy until the new phone arrived. It was odd going back to a phone of simpler times, but I got used to it quite quickly and atually liked it. I have to say, my high tech new phone at times does not seem as easy to use as this one, and I do still use this spare phone today for that reason, as it does have prepaid minutes left. Thus, great phone in good shape, came with a battery so I didn't even really need to order spares, and works just as new. Only odd thing which might be from the service company is I keep getting texts saying a credit card of mine is being charged...but it is a different phone number, so I think that must be the service company. Made a good replacement and back-up phone and I would recommened as that, or, recommend as a phone if one just wants to mae calls and text only and prefers simpler times :).

Reviews.Title: LG vx5500 cell phone
Reviews.Author: Rat4444 "clear thinker"
Reviews.Content: I gave 5500 four stars, based on it being a simple prepaid phone. It is compact, sturdy, much more than most prepaids that I tried. Good price on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Broken one
Reviews.Author: Yuri
Reviews.Content: The phone that I have received was broken one - mic and dynamic (earpiece) were faulty, I tried to connect headphones, but no sound.Thanks for seller - after my complain they send my money back!

Reviews.Title: Be VERY careful
Reviews.Author: Charles "spider guy"
Reviews.Content: Verizon's customer service is notoriously bad, something driven home after a recent encounter.We had 7 charges from Verizon Wireless on our bank statement that were debited by Verizon Wireless Prepaid Account in one day without being credited to the cell phone account. We called Verizon's customer service and both the rep and supervisor refused to look into the issue, so we had to file disputes with our bank.So far, the attempt to add $20 to the cell phone account has cost us more than 4 hours and more than $150 in contested fees.On the flip side ... no problems with our LG phones.
